title: ≡Newly renovated *2 bedroom *2 full bath apartment *Wide W/D≡
posting_body: Apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, just refurbished, is now offered to rent!
a bathroom, a kitchen with a refrigerator and a self-cleaning glass-top stove in stainless steel.
Very roomy!
extensive front porch!
Everything is clean and recently painted.
sufficient off-street parking, Included are water, sewage, garbage, sanding, and grass care.
(Electricity and heat are not included) Laundry facilities, a grocery store, and Main Street are all within walking distance of the majority of the living areas.
Wood look laminate flooring.
A/C, hot water heater, washer, and dryer are all modern additions.

Animal Friendly FUQUAY-VARINA AND CARY LIVING ROOM, DINING AREA, PRIVATE ENTRANCE, FULL KITCHEN WITH REFRIGERATOR, STOVE & OVEN, AND DISHWASHER Large living space, walk-in closet, lovely terrace, and convenient location.
Currently, high-speed fiber optic wireless Internet is offered as an extra perk at no additional cost.
Behind the unit, on a private driveway, is off-street parking.
Both grass maintenance and driveway snow removal are included.
On-site washing facilities accept coins.
A fire alarm system protects this structure.
Despite being situated on "major street" in the heart of the city, it maintains a tranquil environment because to its high walls and back entrance.
All of your requirements will be accessible on foot; the grocery store is a half-block distant.
There is room for one or two persons in this flat.
Cats and fish are among the acceptable types of pets.
We make utility payments (heat, water, sewer, electric, and air conditioning).
Give us your phone number, the names of the people who will be residing in the flat, and the date you would want to move in.
